articles.author: By ASHRAF KHALIL and DAVID SHARP
articles.title: Abortion rights backers rally in anger over post-Roe future - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Supporters of abortion rights took to the streets across America on Saturday to make clear their anger at the prospect that the Supreme Court will soon strike down the constitutional right to abortion.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Supporters of abortion rights took to the streets across America on Saturday to make clear their anger at the prospect that the Supreme Court will soon strike down the constitutional … [+4847 chars]

articles.author: Farrah Tomazin
articles.title: At ASEAN summit Joe Biden reiterates call to disinvite Vladimir Putin from G20 - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The diplomatic nudging came after Indonesian President Joko Widodo, who is currently the G20 president, had resisted America’s calls to bar Russia from the summit in Bali.
